import React from 'react' import Image from '../../../Components/UI/Images/Image' import SubmitButton from '../../../Components/UI/Button/Button' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import '../Login/Login.css' import './Forgot.cs' const Forgotpassword = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset } = useForm({ mode: "onTouched" }); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data); reset(); } return (

Forgot Password

Please provide the email address you have been given to log in.

{errors.email?.message}

) } export default Forgotpassword
